text: Yithiwena(MuhammadkubantubeNcwadi):“Ndinganixelela ngeyona nto imbi kunene kunaleyo, ngokumayela nembuyekezo evela kuAllâh: Loo (maYuda) azitsalela isiQalekiso sika-Allâh neNgqumbo yaKhe namanye awo Awawajikayo, aba ziinkawu neehagu, nalawo akhonza izithixo; abo ngabona bangcolileyo ngokomgangatho, yaye balahleke bakude lee eNdleleni ethe Tye”
